relevant_findings.physical_examination: Cachexia; otherwise appeared well and happy, was playful and active.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weight decreased from 7.6 kg at 17 months to 7.4 kg at 19 months despite reports of adequate food intake.

relevant_findings.physical_examination: Weight was 7.3 kg (<1st percentile); physical examination otherwise unchanged.
relevant_findings.other_findings: Tests for anti–tissue transglutaminase IgA and IgG antibodies and HIV were negative.
